advancements.adventure.activate_impendui: Activate properly mirrored Impenduit Pylons by right-clicking one with a Heart of the Sea
advancements.adventure.deactivate_impend: Deactivate an Impenduit Field by right-clicking with a Pickaxe to remove the power source.
advancements.adventure.walk_on_impenduit: Walk on an Impenduit Field with Frost Walker
advancements.nether.use_riptide_in_ultra: Use a Riptide Trident in an ultrawarm dimension while touching an Impenduit Field
